verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Maskil of the sons of Korah.) O God, <S%H430><s%> we have heard <S%H8085><s%> with our ears, <S%H241><s%> Our fathers have told <S%H1><s%> us, The work <S%H5608><s%> that Thou didst <S%H6467><s%> in their days, <S%H6466><s%> In the days <S%H3117><s%> of old. <S%H3117><s%>

Thou with Thine own hand <S%H3027><s%> didst drive <S%H3423><s%> out the nations; <S%H1471><s%> Then Thou didst plant <S%H5193><s%> them; Thou didst afflict <S%H7489><s%> the peoples, <S%H3816><s%> Then Thou didst spread <S%H7971><s%> them abroad.

For by their own sword <S%H2719><s%> they did not possess <S%H3423><s%> the land; <S%H776><s%> And their own arm <S%H2220><s%> did not save <S%H3467><s%> them; But Thy right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> and Thine arm, <S%H2220><s%> and the light <S%H216><s%> of Thy presence, <S%H6440><s%> For Thou didst favor <S%H7521><s%> them.
Thou art my King, <S%H4428><s%> O God; <S%H430><s%> Command <S%H6680><s%> victories <S%H3444><s%> for Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

Through Thee we will push <S%H5055><s%> back <S%H5055><s%> our adversaries; <S%H6862><s%> Through Thy name <S%H8034><s%> we will trample <S%H947><s%> down <S%H947><s%> those who rise <S%H6965><s%> up against us.
For I will not trust <S%H982><s%> in my bow, <S%H7198><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> will my sword <S%H2719><s%> save <S%H3467><s%> me.
But Thou hast saved <S%H3467><s%> us from our adversaries, <S%H6862><s%> And Thou hast put <S%H954><s%> to shame <S%H954><s%> those who hate <S%H8130><s%> us.

In God <S%H430><s%> we have boasted <S%H1984><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> long, And we will give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Thy name <S%H8034><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Yet <S%H637><s%> Thou hast rejected <S%H2186><s%> [us] and brought <S%H3637><s%> us to dishonor, <S%H3637><s%> And dost not go <S%H3318><s%> out with our armies. <S%H6635><s%>
Thou dost cause us to turn <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H268><s%> from the adversary; <S%H6862><s%> And those who hate <S%H8130><s%> us have taken <S%H8154><s%> spoil <S%H8154><s%> for themselves.
Thou dost give <S%H5414><s%> us as sheep <S%H6629><s%> to be eaten, <S%H3978><s%> And hast scattered <S%H2219><s%> us among the nations. <S%H1471><s%>
Thou dost sell <S%H4376><s%> Thy people <S%H5971><s%> cheaply, <S%H3808><s%> <S%H1952><s%> And hast not profited <S%H7235><s%> by their sale. <S%H4242><s%>
Thou dost make <S%H7760><s%> us a reproach <S%H2781><s%> to our neighbors, <S%H7934><s%> A scoffing <S%H3933><s%> and a derision <S%H7047><s%> to those around <S%H5439><s%> us.
Thou dost make <S%H7760><s%> us a byword <S%H4912><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> A laughingstock <S%H4493><s%> <S%H7218><s%> among the peoples. <S%H3816><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> long my dishonor <S%H3639><s%> is before <S%H5048><s%> me, And my humiliation <S%H1322><s%> <S%H6440><s%> has overwhelmed <S%H3680><s%> me,

Because <S%H4480><s%> of the voice <S%H6963><s%> of him who reproaches <S%H2778><s%> and reviles, <S%H1442><s%> Because <S%H4480><s%> of the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the enemy <S%H340><s%> and the avenger. <S%H5358><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H384><s%> has come <S%H935><s%> upon us, but we have not forgotten <S%H7911><s%> Thee, And we have not dealt <S%H8266><s%> falsely <S%H8266><s%> with Thy covenant. <S%H1285><s%>
Our heart <S%H3820><s%> has not turned <S%H5472><s%> back, <S%H268><s%> And our steps <S%H9036><s%> have not deviated <S%H5186><s%> from Thy way, <S%H734><s%>
Yet <S%H3588><s%> Thou hast crushed <S%H1794><s%> us in a place <S%H4725><s%> of jackals, <S%H8565><s%> And covered <S%H3680><s%> us with the shadow <S%H6757><s%> of death. <S%H6757><s%>
If <S%H518><s%> we had forgotten <S%H7911><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of our God, <S%H430><s%> Or extended <S%H6566><s%> our hands <S%H3709><s%> to a strange <S%H2114><s%> god; <S%H410><s%>
Would not God <S%H430><s%> find <S%H2713><s%> this <S%H384><s%> out? For He knows <S%H3045><s%> the secrets <S%H8587><s%> of the heart. <S%H3820><s%>
But for Thy sake <S%H5921><s%> we are killed <S%H2026><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> long; We are considered <S%H2803><s%> as sheep <S%H6629><s%> to be slaughtered. <S%H2878><s%>
Arouse <S%H5782><s%> Thyself, why <S%H4100><s%> dost Thou sleep, <S%H3462><s%> O Lord <S%H136><s%>? Awake, <S%H9516><s%> do not reject <S%H2186><s%> us forever. <S%H5331><s%>
Why <S%H4100><s%> dost Thou hide <S%H5641><s%> Thy face, <S%H6440><s%> And forget <S%H7911><s%> our affliction <S%H6040><s%> and our oppression <S%H3906><s%>?
For our soul <S%H5315><s%> has sunk <S%H7743><s%> down <S%H7743><s%> into the dust; <S%H6083><s%> Our body <S%H990><s%> cleaves <S%H1692><s%> to the earth. <S%H776><s%>
Rise <S%H6965><s%> up, be our help, <S%H5833><s%> And redeem <S%H6299><s%> us for the sake <S%H4616><s%> of Thy lovingkindness. <S%H2617><s%>
